DOC.brief_summary: Nowadays , TRUS biopsy become one popular test diagnosis prostate cancer . This procedure cause pain patient receive sedative drug analgesic drug . There many way reduce pain inconvenience patient , intravenous propofol , intravenous fentanyl etc . In Siriraj hospital , anesthesiologists usually give intravenous propofol intravenous opioids visual analogue score procedure average 0.9-2.9 . Furthermore , systematic review show difference pain score periprostatic nerve block plus opioid periprostatic nerve block . So , study find whether opioids need TRUS biopsy .
DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Propofol Fentanyl v Propofol Sedation TRUS Biopsy
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year Patient American society anesthesiology physical status IIII . Scheduled Transrectal ultrasoundguided prostate biopsy BMI equal less 30 kg/cm2 Known hypersensitivity propofol fentanyl History bleeding tendency Known case active anal rectal disease Unable rate pain score History drug abuse Chronic opioid use
